name: incomplete-hosts Chef cookbook
readme:
# incomplete-hosts Cookbook Dynamically manages the HOSTS file ## Usage Just include `incomplete-hosts` in your node's `run_list` ```json { "name": "my_node", "run_list": ["recipe[incomplete-hosts]"] } ``` ```ruby name 'my_node' run_list 'recipe[incomplete-hosts]' ``` ## Attributes
Key Type Description Default
['incomplete-hosts']['search_query'] String The search query used to find nodes to add. e.g. role:db '*:*'
